it.cnr.isti.wnlab.indoornavigation.android.compass

Class LawitzkiCompass

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.cnr.isti.wnlab.indoornavigation.observer.AbstractEmitter<Heading>
      • it.cnr.isti.wnlab.indoornavigation.Compass
        • it.cnr.isti.wnlab.indoornavigation.android.compass.LawitzkiCompass
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Emitter<Heading>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RelativeCompass

    public class LawitzkiCompass
extends Compass
    This class represents a compass derived from low-filtered Accelerometer and Magnetometer and high-filtered gyroscope. The output is the rotation of the phone from the north, between -pi and pi. Code is an adaptation of https://www.codeproject.com/Articles/729759/Android-Sensor-Fusion-Tutorial
